name: My Picks for the 92nd Acadamy Awards
description: I discuss who I think should and will win at the 92nd Academy Awards.

name: Ad Astra review
description: A fully Original and Unique movie, Ad Astra is one of the better film-going experiences of 2019.

name: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood Review
description: Quentin Tarantino is back, but this time his film has a much different feel to it.
